languages.text: "Тупоголовые ашмаги! Вы правда думаете, что друкари заберут вас в чудесные дали? В лучшем случаем вас посадят на цепь. В худшем..."
"Stupid ashmags! Do you really think the Drukhari will whisk you away to a far-off wonderland? At best they'll put you in chains. At worst..."
languages.original_text: "Тупоголовые ашмаги! Вы правда думаете, что друкари заберут вас в чудесные дали? В лучшем случаем вас посадят на цепь. В худшем..."

traits.locale_text: "Stupid ashmags! Do you really think the Drukhari will whisk you away to a far-off wonderland? At best they'll put you in chains. At worst..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Stupid ashmags! Do you really think the Drukhari will whisk you away to a far-off wonderland? At best they'll put you in chains. At worst..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Stupid ashmags! Do you really think the Drukhari will whisk you away to a far-off wonderland? At best they'll put you in chains. At worst..."

traits.locale_text: "Stupid ashmags! Do you really think the Drukhari will whisk you away to a far-off wonderland? At best they'll put you in chains. At worst..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「大バカ言わないでよ！このデュカーリがはるか遠くのおとぎの国にアンタを連れてってくれると本気で思ってんの？よくても鎖につながれるだろうし、最悪は…」
languages.original_text: "Stupid ashmags! Do you really think the Drukhari will whisk you away to a far-off wonderland? At best they'll put you in chains. At worst..."

traits.locale_text: 「大バカ言わないでよ！このデュカーリがはるか遠くのおとぎの国にアンタを連れてってくれると本気で思ってんの？よくても鎖につながれるだろうし、最悪は…」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “愚蠢的坏种！你真的以为黑暗灵族会带你去什么遥不可及的仙境乐园吗？最好的情况下，他们会用铁链把你拴起来。至于最坏的情况嘛……”
languages.original_text: "Stupid ashmags! Do you really think the Drukhari will whisk you away to a far-off wonderland? At best they'll put you in chains. At worst..."

traits.locale_text: “愚蠢的坏家伙！你真的以为黑暗灵族会带你去什么遥不可及的仙境乐园吗？最好的情况下，他们会用铁链把你拴起来。至于最坏的情况嘛……”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Maudits ashmags ! Vous pensez vraiment que les Drukharis vous emmèneront dans un lointain pays merveilleux ? Au mieux, ils vous enchaîneront. Au pire... »
languages.original_text: "Stupid ashmags! Do you really think the Drukhari will whisk you away to a far-off wonderland? At best they'll put you in chains. At worst..."

traits.locale_text: « Maudits ashmags ! Vous pensez vraiment que les Drukhari vous emmèneront dans un lointain pays merveilleux ? Au mieux, ils vous enchaîneront. Au pire... »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «¡Ashmags de las narices! ¿De verdad os creíais que los Drukhari os iban a llevar a un lugar de ensueño? En el mejor de los casos os encadenarían. Y en el peor...».
languages.original_text: "Stupid ashmags! Do you really think the Drukhari will whisk you away to a far-off wonderland? At best they'll put you in chains. At worst..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ashmags de las narices! ¿De verdad os creíais que los Drukhari os iban a llevar a un lugar de ensueño? En el mejor de los casos os encadenarían. Y en el peor...».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Dämliche Ashmags! Denkt Ihr ernsthaft, die Drukhari bringen Euch in ein fernes Wunderland? Die legen Euch bestenfalls in Ketten. Und schlimmstenfalls ..."
languages.original_text: "Stupid ashmags! Do you really think the Drukhari will whisk you away to a far-off wonderland? At best they'll put you in chains. At worst..."

traits.locale_text: "Dämliche Ashmags! Denkt Ihr ernsthaft, die Drukhari bringen Euch in ein fernes Wunderland? Die legen Euch bestenfalls in Ketten. Und schlimmstenfalls ..."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Aptal külboğazlar! Drukharilerin gerçekten sizi uzaklardaki güzel mi güzel bir diyara götüreceğini mi sanıyorsunuz? Şanslıysanız sizi zincire vururlar. Şansınız yoksa..."
languages.original_text: "Stupid ashmags! Do you really think the Drukhari will whisk you away to a far-off wonderland? At best they'll put you in chains. At worst..."

traits.locale_text: "Aptal külboğazlar! Drukharilerin gerçekten sizi uzaklardaki güzel mi güzel bir diyara götüreceğini mi sanıyorsunuz? Şanslıysanız sizi zincire vururlar. Şansınız yoksa..."
